attributes.action: Introduce rules to govern the activities of Vehicle Clamping Organisations on Private Ground. That signage should be very large and visible particularly the word Clamping. That there should be a ceiling of £30-00 on charges except for persistent offenders and not £300-00 as operates in some places.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Private clampers are engaged in entrapment and  extortion against any kind of natural justice.  The Police regard their activities as anti-social but have no powers to deal with them because it is private land.
